price: وە ئەگەر پرسیاریان لێ بکەیت کێ دروستی کردوون؟ بێگومان دەڵێن خوا دەی چۆن ئەوان لەھەق وڕاستی لادەدن
arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَهُمۡ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ يُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqahum layaqūlunna al-lahu fa-annā yu'fakūna
